title: 04/28/21 DPS Best Of
itunes:title: 04/28/21 DPS Best Of
description:
On today’s Dan Patrick Show, the NFL Draft talk continues as the with a day left before the Draft. Pro Football Focus analyst Steve Palazzolo joined the show in the first hour to talk about Justin Field’s status and where he thinks he would fit best. In hour two, Mel Kiper Jr. previews part of the draft as he prepares to cover his 38th draft with ESPN tomorrow night. Finally, Andy Staples joins the show to talk college football as the league looks to possibly expand it’s college football playoff field.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
